name: Blood & Pain
description:
"No pain, no gain"

Crush your hearts into blood for shooting, and turn blood back to hearts, in a frantic fight, balancing attacking and healing.

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Dash
  • R to Reload
  • F to Heal
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Right Click to Slash

Note:

  • You can live for a short time without any hearts
  • Please refresh the page to start a new game
